descriptionHtml:
Skyrim_Conjuration_Project_Mod Update Version 1.5

INTRODUCTION:

First of all if you are reading this for the first time don\'t
forget to read the part bellow of the version 1.0 that is 
the original introduction to this mod in order for you to 
understand what the mod is all about.

This new update of the Version 1.0 brings more summonable
creatures and Craftable Spell Tomes; Scrolls and Magic Staves
and some new features that i will explain next.

NEW FEATURES (VERSION 1.5):

The new creatures that you can summon by crafting their 
spell Tomes, Scrolls and Magic Staves are:

Spriggan

Spriggan Matron

Skeleton Swordsmen

Skeleton Two Handed Swordsmen

Skeleton Archer

Restless Draugr Male 

Restless Draugr Female

In this mod there will be also unique creatures and characters
from the world of Skyrim; and since they are unique you will
be summoning them once a day only; in this case they will be 
available in your characters menu in the Powers section and
not in the conjuration Spells.

The Unique characters and creatures available so far are:

Malkoran\'s Shade

Ghost of Old Hroldan


Another feature that this mod adds is that conjurers will
no longer just summon atronachs but will summon all sorts
of creatures from skyrim according to their skill level.

Forsworn will no longer just summon atronachs but will also
summon creatures from the wilds like wolfs, bears, sabre cats, etc...

Witches will now summon undead like skeletons;corrupted shades and 
creatures like spiders, skeevers and wolfs.

Necromancers will summon undead like skeletons; corrupted shades
and draugrs.

NEXT UPDATE:

In the next update there will be of course more creatures
for you to summon and more craftable Spell Tomes, Scrolls and
Magic Staves; more unique creatures and characters.
I will also make the Thalmor summon more creatures like 
magic anomalies; whisp mothers; ice Wraiths, etc..

PS: One thing that i would like to ask all of you that have
downloaded the previous version or are going to download
the new version is to comment about the mod; because i really
like when i get feedback i order get your impression about
 the mod; but never the less thanks for reading and if you
really liked the mod don\'t forget to endorse.


Skyrim_Conjuration_Project_Mod Version 1.0

This Mod adds to Skyrim 40 creatures for you to summon as
well as Craftable Scrolls, Spell Tomes and Magic Staves;
it also allows you to summon more creatures as you level up
 in your conjuration Perk Tree.

INTRODUCTION:

The Skyrim Conjuration Project is a mod that aims to make
the conjuration player have a better experience when
playing Skyrim as a Conjurer; it gives the player more 
creatures to summon; more craftable scrolls, Spell tomes
and Magic Staves and also allows you to summon more 
creatures as your progress in the conjuration Perk Tree.
The new Scrolls, Spell tomes and Magic Staves will also
be in vendor Stores in Loot and in chests.
Conjurers will also summon new creatures instead of 
summoning the traditional familiar or flame or frost
Atronach.


FEATURES OF THE MOD:

The Creatures you will be able to Summon; Craft Spell Tomes
; Scrolls or Magic Staves are:

BEAR
CAVE BEAR
CHAURUS
CHAURUS REAPER
DRAGON PRIEST
DRAUGR DEATH OVERLORD
DREMORA LORD
DWARVEN CENTURION
DWARVEN SPHERE
DWARVEN SPIDER
FALMER SHAMAN
FALMER SPELLSWORD BOSS
FAMILIAR
FIRE DRAGON
FLAME ATRONACH
FORSWORN BRIHEART MAGIC
FORSWORN BRIHEART MELEE
FROST ATRONACH
FROST DRAGON
FROST TROLL
FROSTBITE SPIDER
FROSTBITE SPIDER LARGE 
FROSTBITE SPIDER GIANT
GIANT MUDCRAB
GIANT
HAGRAVEN
ICE WOLF
ICE WRAITH
MAGIC ANOMALY
MALKORAN\'S SHADE
SABRE CAT
SKEEVER
SKELETON MAGE
SKELETON NECRO IMPERIAL
SKELETON NECRO MELEE
SKELETON NECRO STORMCLOAK
SNOW BEAR
SNOW FROSTBITE SPIDER
SNOW FROSTBITE SPIDER LARGE
SNOW FROSTBITE SPIDER GIANT
SNOWY SABER CAT
STORM ATRONACH
TROLL
UNDEAD DRAGON
WISP MOTHER
WOLF

All of the scrolls, spell tomes and magic staves are only 
craftable at the Skyforge in whiterun.

At the vanilla game you can only summon one creature and as
you would get stronger you still only could summon one 
creature no matter how strong it was.
But with the Skyrim_Conjuration_Project Mod you now will
be able to summon up to a total of five creatures.
At novice conjuration you will still be able only to summon 
one creture; but with this mod at the apprentice conjuration
 level you will be able to select another perk when you 
level up the next time and then you will be able to summon 
 up to two creatures.
As you progress in your conjuration; the same selectable 
perk will be available when you get the adept conjuration perk
 and then you will be able to summon up to three creatures;
 when you get to the expert level you will be able to 
 summon four creatures and finally at master level you will
be able to summon five creatures.
I\'ve made this because it allows you to summon more creatures
as you get stronger; but still doesn\'t make super powerfull
and makes the mod more lore friendly.

FUTURE OF THE MOD:

In the future i will try to update the mod every week and
add more summonable creatures and craftable spell tomes,
scrolls, and magic staves or anyother content related to 
conjuration magic.




(PS: I suggest that you play with this mod at Master difficulty
if you are an experienced player and also with the mods 
Warzones_Civil_Unrest and Deadly_Dragons and anyother mods
that make the game more difficult). 

If you really enjoyed the mod don\'t forget to endorse; and 
once again feel free to comment about the mod and give ideas.



INSTALLING: Just place the TotalConjuration.esp file in your
skyrim Data Folder and before playing check if the file is
activated in your skyrim data files menu or in your mod manager.
author: Sergeynest
